entry.title: 20 Pack | 11" Real Natural Peacock Feathers, DIY Craft Feathers
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5180
Type: Decorations
Price: 9.39

[About]

Quantity: 20 Peacock Feathers
Material: Natural Feather
Color: Iridescent
Total Length: 11"
Total Width: 2.5"
Peacock Eye Size: 2"L x 1"W
Design is only 1-Sided
100% genuine natural Peacock Feathers, no dye or chemicals added.
All of our feather items have been professionally cleaned, steamed, and sanitized to perfection.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • DIY Crafts: These Feathers can be used in many Arts & Crafts Projects, Schools and DIY Projects (Scrap Booking, Card Making, Gift Wrapping, Stickers), Mask Making, Fashion Accessories for Headbands, Hair, Hat, Millinery, Shoe Clips, Purse Embellishments, Bracelet, Earrings, Necklaces, Floral Arrangements, Feather Bouquets, Boutonnieres, and more.
  • Great for making headdresses for Carnivals, Mardi Gras, Festivals, Native American or Aztec Cultural Dance, along with Home and Holiday Decor. They are also perfect for Fly Fishing and Fly Tying.
  • Note: Peacock Eye is OVAL-Shaped and that's why it has 2 measurements unlike a circle

entry.title: Pack of 12 - 13"-15" Rose Gold Natural Plume Ostrich Feathers Centerpiece
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5180
Type: Decorations
Price: 15.99 - 89.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 12 Feathers / Order
Material: Natural Feather
Color: Rose Gold
Height: 13" - 15"
Width: Between 4" - 6"
Original Ostrich Feathers
Note: As they are natural feathers, they may vary in sizes and shape.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 12 Feathers / Order
  • Material: Natural Feather
  • Color: Rose Gold
  • Height: 13" - 15"
  • Width: Between 4" - 6" 
  • Note: The colors may vary from the pictures due to lighting and screen resolution.
  • Steps to Clean the Feathers:
    • Fill the bucket or tub with warm water.
    • Add a small amount of Woolite and agitate the water to mix.
    • Swish the feathers around the water. Do NOT scrub the feather as this will damage them.
    • Rinse by swishing in clean water.
    • Reshape the feathers.
    • Dry with a blow dryer on a low setting.
  • Uses:
    • Feather Centerpieces
    • Craft Feathers
    • Decorative Feathers
    • Eiffel tower Centerpieces
    • Feather Arrangements
    • Ostrich Centerpieces

Feathers are clean and sanitized, no smell. Ready to be used.
Used In: Craft decoration, boho themed party, baby shower, nursery, birthday party, Christmas party, wedding

Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • These eye catching feathers can be used as dream catcher, mask, feather garland, and decorating for wall art, boho themed party, baby shower, nursery, birthday party, christmas party.
  • Use for many DIY projects as decorative craft feathers.
  • They’re real feather set, so feathers may vary in size and shape.

Steps to Clean the Feathers:

  • Fill the bucket or tub with warm water.
  • Add a small amount of Woolite and agitate the water to mix.
  • Swish the feathers around the water. Do NOT scrub the feather as this will damage them.
  • Rinse by swishing in clean water.
  • Reshape the feathers.
  • Dry with a blow dryer on a low setting.

  • Dry with a blow dryer on a low setting.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • These Satin trim feathers can be used as Cake stand decors, dream catcher, mask, feather garland, and decorating for wall art, boho themed party, baby shower, nursery, birthday party, christmas party.
  • Use for many DIY projects as decorative craft feathers.
  • They’re real feather set, so feathers may vary in size and shape.

Steps to Clean the Feathers:

  • Fill the bucket or tub with warm water.
  • Add a small amount of Woolite and agitate the water to mix.
  • Swish the feathers around the water. Do NOT scrub the feather as this will damage them.
  • Rinse by swishing in clean water.
  • Reshape the feathers.
  • Dry with a blow dryer on a low setting.
